Poll
Poll

Contains logic for the Poll Node command.

Functions

WirelessPacket::
AsppVersion 
asppVer,
NodeAddress 
nodeAddress,
const 
ChannelMask& 
chMask
)

Builds the Poll command packet.

Parameters
asppVer
WirelessPacket::AsppVersion

The WirelessPacket::AsppVersion to build the command for.

nodeAddress
NodeAddress

The address of the Node to build the command for.

chMask
const ChannelMask&

The ChannelMask representing the channels to poll.

Returns

A ByteStream containing the command packet.

Functions
Response
Response(
NodeAddress 
nodeAddress,
std::
weak_ptr<ResponseCollector> 
collector
)

Creates a Poll Response object

Parameters
nodeAddress
NodeAddress

The node address to check for.

collector
std::weak_ptr<ResponseCollector>

The ResponseCollector used to register and unregister the response.

Variables
m_nodeAddress
NodeAddress m_nodeAddress

The node address to look for in the response.

m_started
bool m_started

Whether the Poll has been successfully started or not (as reported by the Node).

m_timeUntilCompletion
float m_timeUntilCompletion

The amount of time (in seconds) that the Poll operation will take to complete.  This value gets reported by the Node before starting the Poll.

m_result
WirelessPollData m_result

The <WirelessPollData> response from a successful poll command.

Functions
started
bool started() const

Gets whether the Poll operation has started or not.

Returns

true if the Node indicated that the Poll operation has started, false otherwise.

timeToComplete
float timeToComplete() const

Gets the total time (in seconds) that the Node reported it will take to complete the Poll operation.

Returns

The time (in seconds) that the Node reported it will take to complete Poll.

result
const WirelessPollData& result() const

Gets the <WirelessPollData> from a successful poll command.

Returns

A <WirelessPollData> map.
